Subject: Re: Chalhoub Ariane Renewal SOW

 

Hi Asfand,

 

Re-adding Chalhoub team to the thread. 

 

I have not seen these edits before and they are on a previous version, not the final version shared. See my comments below:

 

*	The amendments to clause 2.3 and 2.4 are not acceptable - this is a continuity provision, not a renewal clause. We can discuss concerns they might have about terminating in the event Services continue past the term, however:

	*	As it is not a renewal clause, we will not agree to insert an additional term period or a qualification for fee increase;

*	The amendments to clause 2.3 and 2.4 are not acceptable - this is a continuity provision, not a renewal clause. We can discuss concerns they might have about terminating in the event Services continue past the term, however:

	*	As it is not a renewal clause, we will not agree to insert an additional term period or a qualification for fee increase; 

	*	The amendment to the termination for covenience clause was only to remove the language for the minimum term, not to reassign rights. Therefore, we will not agree to a mutual termination for convenience clause during the term in any circumstance.

*	The amendments the newly added clause 2.7 re: insurance will need confirmation from the Tech&Data team / Chalhoub insurance specialist.

*	Newly added clause 2.8 regarding employee transfer will require confirmation from Tech&Data team, however I believe its fine.

 

Best,

Faraz
